articles.content: ROME, Sept 25 (Reuters) - Italian Mafia boss Matteo Messina Denaro, who was convicted of multiple murders and was arrested in January after spending 30 years on the run, has died of cancer, officials… [+3687 chars]

articles.title: "Deters New Investments": EU Trade Chief Warns China Over Tough Laws, Russia Stance - NDTV
articles.description: The EU's trade chief told Beijing on Monday that tough security laws and a more "politicised" business environment have left European companies struggling to understand their obligations and questioning their future in China.
articles.content:
China's commerce ministry has condemned the EU's "naked protectionism" (File)

articles.title: Witness Earth's equal day and night: European Space Agency shares equinox photo - Hindustan Times
articles.description: European Space Agency shares a satellite image showcasing the Autumn equinox, marking the division of day and night on Earth's surface.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency (ESA) shared a satellite image on Saturday, showcasing a clear division of day and night on Earth's surface, representing the autumn equinox.
